page.title: 02LANDSCAPE
page.content: The landscape around Kingswinford is fairly uneven due to mining in the past. The{soil}is very mixed ranging from sand to clay. There is quite a lot of{open ground} and{pools}around the Dawley Brook and Wallows Industrial Estate. The Fens Pools are surrounded by coarse grass and wasteland, unlike the Dawley Brook area which is mainly flat. The{factories}are mainly made of steel and corrugated iron although some are brick and plastic. Most of the area is now covered by {houses}made of brick with roofs of tiles or slates. The{roadsides}are mainly lined with trees which include cherry blossom, sycamore and horse chestnut.
